profile:
A design/build renovation company that specialized in large scale renovations. You can be sure that your home IS in good hands with Team Shane. We walk along side you through the concept, design, and build stages of your dream home. With our in-house design team, capable of all things from 3 dimensional renderings to complete permit drawings, we can help you turn your vision into a plan that can be built.

We understand that renovating is about much more than the actual build. We know that establishing a relationship, developing trust, and clear communication are the ONLY ways to give you the renovation you deserve.

Preliminary Package
We start with a design consultation on site to discuss ideas and plans for your project. We can provide the knowledge and expertise to assist you in visualizing your ideas and formulating a budget.

Architectural Design
We can provide you with the necessary construction drawings to ensure things get built properly and obtain any necessary permits.

Turning your dream into a reality begins with understanding what the end result may look like. We can help you with this by providing both concept plans and 3-Dimensional visuals.

Project Management
Whether your project is a whole home renovation, addition, or brand new construction, we can provide full general contracting services from start to finish.


Completing your project is not the end of our relationship. We provide for a full 5 year warranty on all work we do and will be there should any service issues arise
service_area: Hamilton, Ancaster, Dundas, Burlington, Stoney Creek, Oakville
services:

profile:
Design is an evolving process. Great design comes from the cultivation of unrestricted and often communal ideas. Dezsa’s primary focus is to assist our clients in communicating and developing their ideas in ways that are both purposeful and well designed. We open every project with a straightforward approach and a fresh perspective that begins with possibility. We guide our clients to making informed decisions that fit their budget and their personal vision.

We believe in social responsibility, in being grateful for the gifts we have in order to give back, and to bettering our community. We encourage our clients to support this and other community enriching organizations.
The name Dezsa (Pronounced “Desha”) honours a dear friend who passed away in 2015. Without him, Dezsa Design would not have come to fruition.

WE OFFER: 
Residential and boutique commercial design, and project management services for interior and exterior renovations including: Consultations, site measurements, existing plans, concept design, schematic design and 3D modeling, project budgeting, custom millwork design, permit preparation and applications, FF&E sourcing, material / finish sourcing, custom softgoods design.

COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT:
“I am only one, but I am still one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something I can do.” – Helen Keller

Habitat for Humanity Hamilton: Dezsa Design is committed to being socially responsible; being grateful for the gifts we have been given with the ability to give back; and bettering our growing community. 

Note from the Hamilton Executive Director: Robyn contributes her skills with Habitat Hamilton as a designer, a committee member, and as a build site crew leader.  She is a pleasure to work with, and successfully leads volunteers from all walks of life through the construction of our homes.  Robyn is an active participant in committee meetings, and has a keen eye to envision and evolve a space into something that is both functional and beautiful.  Thanks for all you do, Robyn!
